original_text: And then shall he depart from thee, both he and his children with him, and shall return unto his own family, and unto the possession of his fathers shall he return.
korean_text: 그 때에는 그와 그의 자녀가 함께 네게서 떠나 그의 가족과 그의 조상의 기업으로 돌아가게 하라

sentences.original_text: And then shall he depart from thee
sentences.korean_translation: 그 때에 그는 너에게서 떠날 것이요

sentences.original_text: both he and his children with him
sentences.korean_translation: 그와 그의 자녀들이 그와 함께할 것이며

sentences.original_text: and shall return unto his own family
and unto the possession of his fathers shall he return
